name: Puffer Electro
desc4: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct> DMG increases by 20%. Launching an <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct> increases the equipper's ATK by 15% for 12s.
story: This reliable Drive Disc series is favored by Hollow explorers due to its consistent performance. Don't underestimate its effectiveness, pufferfish are poisonous, after all.
